channel.title: Training Places?
channel.description:
Can someone make me a telly code that when clicked on opens up an interface that allows you to either choose low or high train. i'll plug coords in. Also i want it so you cant get into high train unless your are above level 100 combat.
Thanks

item.title: Training Places?
item.dc:creator: @owned654321241 owned654321241
item.description:
@owned654321241 wrote:

Now im just confused. Can someone clear this up for me. All i want is a code that corresponds with this…
For the low train to bring me to 3104, 9518 and the high train to bring me to 2464,4782.
And the lvl 100 cmb requirement to get into high train.

[code]case 4146:
c.teleEffect = 1;
c.sendQuest(“Which training Zone?”, 2470);
c.sendQuest(“Low”, 2471);
c.sendQuest("", 2472);
c.sendQuest(“High”, 2473);
c.sendFrame164(2469);
break;

		case 50253:
			c.teleEffect = 1;
			c.sendQuest("Which Training Zone?", 2470);
			c.sendQuest("Low", 2471);
			c.sendQuest("", 2472);
			c.sendQuest("High", 2473);
			c.sendFrame164(2469);
			break;[/code]

Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Training Places?
item.dc:creator: @Girona Girona
item.description:
@Girona wrote:

It is possible, not sure if it will work, if you click on the button that is supposed to teleport you and then look in your run CMD, you will see something like this for example

[Girona]- Clicking action button 40162.

I’m not sure what it completely says but something like that. If it does not work on your DeltaScape server then try a Czar base, I know it works on them. KNOW.

Read full topic

item.title: Training Places?

@owned654321241 wrote:

and how would i come about getting that?

Read full topic

item.title: Training Places?
item.dc:creator: @Girona Girona
item.description:
@Girona wrote:

Open up clickingMost and add

case ##: c.triggerTele(2464,4782, 0); c.sM("You teleport to high training!."); } break;

You must find the correct button ID first

Read full topic

item.title: Training Places?
item.dc:creator: @owned654321241 owned654321241
item.description:
@owned654321241 wrote:

Its delta i believe but idk what your telling me to do.

Read full topic

item.title: Training Places?
item.dc:creator: @Girona Girona
item.description:
@Girona wrote:

If you are using DeltaScape then get the action button ID and add it to clickingMost.

case ##: c.triggerTele(#X#, #Y#, 0); c.sM("Feel free to send a message to the player."); } break;

If you are using Czar / a source that Czar was created from, you will use something like this in Case 185.

case ##: teleToX = #X#; teleToY = #Y#; sendMessage("Feel free to send a message to the player."); } break;

Read full topic

item.title: Training Places?

item.description:
@owned654321241 wrote:

K this is what i got, it opens up interface but this is were i am stumped… what do i do to make it so it actually tele’s me when i click on “low” or “high”? These are the coords i want the two tele places to go to… “Low”= 3104, 9518 and “High”= 2464,4782

[code]case 4146:
c.teleEffect = 1;
c.sendQuest(“Which training Zone?”, 2470);
c.sendQuest(“Low”, 2471);
c.sendQuest("", 2472);
c.sendQuest(“High”, 2473);
c.sendFrame164(2469);

			break;

		case 50253:
			c.teleEffect = 1;
			c.sendQuest("Which Training Zone?", 2470);
			c.sendQuest("Low", 2471);
			c.sendQuest("", 2472);
			c.sendQuest("High", 2473);
			c.sendFrame164(2469);

			break;[/code]
